name: That's Life (maxi1324)
description:
That's Life

In this Game you play as a Human, who don´t wanna die. Your biggest enemy is cimlate Change. You Decide to take a Car and Destroy all factories with it.

This Game can be played ether with Keyboard and Mouse or Controller. The Gui can only be used with a Mouse

Keyboard Controls:
A D turning
Left Mousbutton Boost if available
Right Mousebutton Drift

Controller Controls:
Leftstick to turn
A to Boost, if available
B to drift

Why is the Theme fited?

Spolier:

The main Person don´t wanna die. That´s why he is saving the Planet. At the end he has, in oder to win, die. Thats why the  Delay the inevitable is only delayed

PS: Sorry for my English, it's late and have fun with this Game:)
